title: Best Bot Lane Champ duos
body:
I think every traditional adc and support has the potential to be successful in lane, but there are those champ matchups that just do extremely well together based on their kits, making it a great kill lane, sustain, lane, etc... 

This is another one of those post on this topic. 

I've focused on bot lane most of my time playing league and have watched, played and experienced a lot of diff types of bots. But these are the ones I've seen do really successful 85% of the time if played correctly- meaning they WILL win lane and get fed, even if the game ends in a loss. This is considering the enemy bot went a traditional adc/sup as well.

{{champion:119}} +{{champion:89}}  is a guarantee kill lane. This duo is SCARY bc you can pick up ez early kills at lv 3 or even 2, giving draven a huge lead to snowball later on. Given the lane is not pushed towards enemy tower, Leo can land her E and Q, which starts the peel process. Then draven's E, Q follow up does major dmg and gives leo and drave extra time to aa some more. If there's a slight chase in this process draven can easily W. This can guarantee the enemy to flash/heal or die xD.  Enemy jg WILL (start to) camp a draven and leona lane. SO WARD UP. get draven fed and if the rest of the team does decent and not feed = gg. Leo bing an all in champ will most likely (almost) die in team fights for her initation but draven may get out alive, and or get kills. But I would just stick near the draven to protect him and not leave him at the back alone. But if he's already able to solo mid/top/jg in a 1v1, you can start helping others. 

{{champion:81}} + {{champion:111}} this bot lane is surprisingly good. Another kill lane. Naut and ez's Q both CANNOT bypass minions. But once Naut lands his Q on an enemy bot laner followed by his "stunning" aa, ez can successfully do a combo E-Q-W or what not. Naut should have his W up to allow his auto attacks to do even more damage for the kill as well. Add in his AOE slow and if the bot laner has no dash/jumps/escapes its a ez heal/flash burn or kill. 
Ez and Naut's ult do very well together- Once naut's ult has triggered &begins to knock up the target, ez will know exactly WHERE to land his ult for the kill. Personally this duo just does really really well from all my experiences, given each player knows the basics of playing their champ ez/naut. But I think if going against a LEO/Drave, this duo might lose early plays, just for the fact that leo can gap close through minions, and naut Cannot :( 

The two kill lanes above have the potential to destroy sustain lanes for example a lane with {{champion:37}} or {{champion:16}}. Focus the sustainer b4 adc in fights. Rakas are F* annoying. but a smart raka will always be way back, ready to NOT get caught, which in this case, being a kill lane might be impossible. In a kill lane vs healer/sustain, attempt to kill the sustainer/healer while exhausting the adc. or just kill whoever is dumb enough to get caught out/be alone by themselves 4 a moment- sometimes a moment is just the right amount of time to kill them. Other than that kill lane adc and sup should use poke to zone csing.

{{champion:40}} + {{champion:202}} is love. Movement speed for dayz while they're near each other. Jhin really doesn't have a gap closer or escape so Janna having great engage and disengage is the perfect sup for him. Get slowed of knocked up by Janna and Jin can easily land a stun. Janna's passive wiLL allow Jhin to easily escape or chase when needed. Janna's ultimate can be used for position when jhin is caught out, or push enemy back in to jhin Ult range.

Okay, so I don't have time to write anymore, but what are some of your opinions and fav duo/matchups?


O mommy I just had to add another one to our list!
{{champion:202}}  + {{champion:111}} 
YOU CAN DO A DOUBLE STUN every 10 sec or so

replies.body: Twitch and Taric for the invisible stun
abusive
GG LOL
Morgana and jihn is really strong as well.  The chain snares
Yes! I forgot about that one! One of my favorite combos if I need to support.
ooh yea I like braum and luc ^^ op
draven leona actually have pretty poor synergy. He goes best with janna according to statistics.
I can only comment on my experience, but Draven and Leona have been quite deadly together...
statistics...

Statistics can "lie" as they only account for raw data and ignore variables such as team overall team composition, skill of the players using a champion, and champions that they are being played into. In these games, statistics maybe a good guide, but aren't necessarily the answer...

> [{quoted}](name=Stark of Wrath,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Eh3jqT46,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-10T21:04:00.765+0000)
>
> I can only comment on my experience, but Draven and Leona have been quite deadly together...

Agreed. from all my experiences as well 0.0

depends on the types of players. I usually play with aggressive adcs who have good mechanics (im very picky about my adcs) and an aggressive draven WILL do well with a Leona majority of the time. Although I agree janna is good paired with anything. I just believe leo and drave can secure more kills in lane for sno balls. supporting your adc in the first 10-15 min will show you how your adc plays. try to adapt and synergize with them the best you can. it can work out.  

Janna just synergizes with everyone with no trying.
I completely disagree. Draven doesnt need help engaging. He needs help disengaging from ganks and he needs a shield for stronger trades.

> [{quoted}](name=MightySaturn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Eh3jqT46,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2016-06-08T18:16:58.668+0000)
>
> I completely disagree. Draven doesnt need help engaging. He needs help disengaging from ganks and he needs a shield for stronger trades.

what better engange and disengage than a stun that comes up every 5 or so Secwith cdr? AND an AOE ult stun?? Leo is definitely one of the best engage and disengage tank. Even tho she has no escapes to save herself, her stuns will def peel for the team! Her passive helps with trades already LOL

a ranged stun that comes up every 7 seconds. An ultimate that makes your adc invulnerable. Eating your adc. Black shielding your adc. Zhonyas for your adc. Janna shields for your adc. Janna ults for your adc. Lulu Ult for your adc. Shall I go on?

Welp, I'm not gonna start an arguement about which supp is the best for engage and diseng. Bc no supp is really better than the other. it's really HOW theyre played and up to the player... unless u wanna 1v1 meh in an epic support battle we can decide lol
Lux ezreal is really fun.  Combo the ults for long range finishes, and the harass is crazy
it's the power of being blond and related

I've always liked {{champion:18}} {{champion:53}} because a hook will almost always result in trist getting her E procs off regardless of whether they have a gap closer or not, and that will either be a kill or a very hard trade to come back from.

Ezreal + soloq potatoe vs anyone.
Jana or soraka + soloq potatoe vs anyone.
Thresh + jinx vs not alistare or blitzcrank.
yea I like soloQ potatoes too. where do they grow?

Vayne: Nami/TK
Kalista: Thresh/Morgana
Jhin: Morgana

Taric works with just about every ADC; IMO his kit prob best for late game ADC's like Vayne. Got utility and armor to help them scale into late through laning phase. 
Rest of the ADC is better to explain like this. MF/Varus/Draven/etc all need engage kill-oriented support to get the scariest combo. Jinx Leo and Thresh also work. The absolute scariest that I love to utilize myself is Kalista Thresh. It is probably the scariest bot comp IMO. Long ago that title belonged to Varus or Jinx Leona. For comps like Leo Draven, if Leona misses E Draven will be focus fired and burn flash and Leo will apply Q late.

IMO Morg Vayne isn't THAT good. It works though. Nami and TK are best for Vayne; most other champs don't even come close to comparing unless you're flawless Taric and Lulu but again Nami and TK are simply better. TK can swallow and spit, Vayne condemn for combo.
youve got it backwards dude. its better to pick the adc based on the support since the supports are dominating lane with proper play anyway.
